name: Whisper of the flame
description:
You are venturing in a dark cave and are trying to keep your soul alive by dodging the watery slime who want to extinguish you and collecting some small flame to warm you up. This game was made under 72 hours and does not have a lot of levels (2 for the moment but I plan to add more and I hope that you will enjoy your experience)

-wasd or arrows to move and jump
